::Lord Elder::
   
  Lord Elder meets up with Jotunn and Dinobot on the Matrix Quest shuttle.
   
  ::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock is standing by on the rescue party shuttle. He waits for Doc and Windlord and Perseus and whoever joins.
   
  From the shuttle Grimlock opens a comm to the Airtankers.
   
  Grimlock: Airtankers no like me Grimlock's flying?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          Jotunn and Dinobot went to the Matrix shuttle.

Jotunn: Alright, you seem to know where the Matrix is. We trust you on
this one.

Dinobot: Understood.

He went to the navigation system and punched in the coordinatesof the
lying Ark.

Dinobot: We're good to go anytime.

Jotunn: Good...

******

Outside, the Airtankers were not happy.

Gunrain: YOU KNOW WHA' HAPPENED LAST TIME! NEVER AGAIN!

Skysword: I agree. We're flyers, after all.

Motherload: Alright then. Shuttle crew, we'll be your cover fire.
Airtankers, Airtank mode!

They combined into a large battleship, bristling with missiles, gun
turrets and even a few larger cannons.

Airtank: Ready when you are.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord ElderGrimlock::
> 
> Elder hits a commlink after watching Kup and Elita's shuttle leave
the area on the sensors.
> 
> Elder: Lord Elder to shuttle port. Prepare two more shuttles for
launch. We have to get moving with two missions immedietly.
> 
> He turns to the rest.
> 
> Elder: Alright so everyone on the rescue party assemble on this
side of the room and be accounted for. Those on the Matrix Quest
assemble over here.
> 
> Elder stands on the side where the Matrix Quest crew should be.
> 
> Grimlock stomps his way to the other side of the room.
> 
> Grimlock: Me Grimlock help Hot Rod and wife!
> 
> 
> ---------------------------------
> Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. 
Try it now.
>
